title: Harley-Davidson LiveWire Electric Motorcycle 2024
description: The 2024 Harley-Davidson LiveWire Electric Motorcycle represents a groundbreaking step in the evolution of electric motorcycles. Designed to deliver an exhilarating and efficient ride, the LiveWire is powered by a state-of-the-art Liquid-Cooled Permanent Magnet Motor that generates an impressive 105 horsepower and 86 lb-ft of torque. With a top speed of 110 mph, this electric motorcycle offers a thrilling experience for riders seeking high performance in a sustainable package. The LiveWire features a 15.5 kWh lithium-ion battery that provides an impressive range of up to 146 miles on a single charge, making it ideal for both daily commutes and longer journeys. The bike’s advanced technology includes a dynamic ride mode selector, offering multiple riding modes such as Road, Sport, and Rain to adapt to various conditions and preferences. Additionally, the LiveWire is equipped with a full-color 4.3-inch TFT display that provides essential ride information, GPS navigation, and smartphone connectivity. Its premium components include Showa suspension, Brembo brakes, and a sleek, aerodynamic design that blends Harley-Davidson’s iconic style with modern electric technology. The LiveWire is perfect for riders who want to experience the power and heritage of Harley-Davidson while embracing the future of electric transportation.
key_features: 105 horsepower and 86 lb-ft of torque from a Liquid-Cooled Permanent Magnet Motor
Top speed of 110 mph and a range of up to 146 miles on a single charge
15.5 kWh lithium-ion battery with fast charging capabilities
Dynamic ride mode selector with multiple modes: Road, Sport, and Rain
4.3-inch full-color TFT display with ride information, GPS navigation, and smartphone connectivity
Premium Showa suspension and Brembo brakes for exceptional ride quality and safety
Aerodynamic design with Harley-Davidson’s iconic styling and modern electric technology

title: 2024 Harley-Davidson LiveWire Electric Motorcycle
description: Introducing the 2024 Harley-Davidson LiveWire Electric Motorcycle, a revolutionary electric bike that combines traditional Harley-Davidson craftsmanship with the latest in electric vehicle technology. This remarkable motorcycle is powered by a cutting-edge Liquid-Cooled Permanent Magnet Motor, delivering 105 horsepower and 86 lb-ft of torque for an exhilarating ride with a top speed of 110 mph. The LiveWire’s 15.5 kWh lithium-ion battery ensures a range of up to 146 miles on a single charge, providing both impressive performance and long-distance capabilities. The bike features a state-of-the-art ride mode selector, allowing riders to choose between Road, Sport, and Rain modes for an optimized riding experience. The 4.3-inch TFT display offers comprehensive ride data, GPS navigation, and smartphone integration, keeping you informed and connected on every journey. Additionally, the LiveWire is equipped with Showa suspension for a smooth and adjustable ride, Brembo brakes for superior stopping power, and a sleek, aerodynamic design that merges classic Harley-Davidson aesthetics with modern electric innovation. Whether you’re a seasoned rider or new to the world of electric motorcycles, the 2024 LiveWire offers a unique and exhilarating experience.

Top speed of 110 mph and up to 146 miles of range per charge

title: Harley-Davidson LiveWire Electric Motorcycle 2024 Model
description: The 2024 Harley-Davidson LiveWire Electric Motorcycle is a game-changing electric bike that combines the power and heritage of Harley-Davidson with the latest in electric vehicle technology. This innovative motorcycle features a Liquid-Cooled Permanent Magnet Motor producing 105 horsepower and 86 lb-ft of torque, offering a top speed of 110 mph and a range of up to 146 miles on a single charge. The 15.5 kWh lithium-ion battery supports fast charging for quick top-ups between rides. The LiveWire is equipped with a variety of advanced features including a ride mode selector with options for Road, Sport, and Rain, allowing riders to tailor their experience to different conditions. The 4.3-inch full-color TFT display provides essential ride data, GPS navigation, and smartphone connectivity, ensuring that you stay connected and informed. Additionally, the LiveWire boasts Showa suspension for a smooth ride, Brembo brakes for superior stopping power, and a sleek, aerodynamic design that maintains Harley-Davidson’s signature style while embracing modern electric technology. Perfect for riders seeking a blend of performance, technology, and iconic design, the LiveWire is the ultimate electric motorcycle for the contemporary rider.
